item.title: Plenary
item.description: Plenary Speakers Fan Chung Graham (University of California, San Diego) Fumio Hiai (Tohoku University) Daniel Kressner (EPFL), LAA Lecture Ren-Cang Li (University of Texas at Arlington) Karen Meagher (University of Regina) Polona Oblak (University of Ljubljana) Fernando De Terán Vergara (Universidad Carlos III de Madrid) Karol Życzkowski (Jagiellonian University) TBA Hans Schneider Prize Lecture TBA SIAG/LA Lecture
